means: 使无效( invalidate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Some of the other criticisms were invalidated years ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他的一些批评多年以前就被证明站不住脚。

sentence.Network_en: An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital.
sentence.Network_cn: 一份官方法令宣布在首都举行的投票无效。

sentence.Network_en: A contract signed now might be invalidated at some future date.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在签订的合同可能在将来的某一天就会失效。

WebBrowser控件 - xSoft的日志 - 网易博客 ... Description 描述 Invalid syntax. 无效的语法。 Access denied. 访问被拒绝。.

entry.def: To invalidate something such as an argument, conclusion, or result means to prove that it is wrong or cause it to be wrong.

example.ex: Any form of physical activity will invalidate the results...
example.tran: 任何形式的物理活动都会证明这些结果是错误的。

example.ex: Some of the other criticisms were invalidated years ago.
example.tran: 其他的一些批评多年以前就被证明站不住脚。

entry.def: If something invalidates something such as a law, contract, or election, it causes it to be considered illegal.

example.ex: An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital...
example.tran: 一份官方法令宣布在首都举行的投票无效。

example.ex: A contract signed now might be invalidated at some future date.
example.tran: 现在签订的合同可能在将来的某一天就会失效。

auth_sentence.content: Is your grasp of the theory so poor that you really believe you have invalidated it?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is your grasp of the theory so poor that you really believe you have invalidated it?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is your grasp of the theory so poor that you really believe you have invalidated it?

auth_sentence.content: Rigged or at least invalidated by the fact that we don't know how many species exist, that number is also a total guess.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rigged or at least invalidated by the fact that we don't know how many species exist, that number is also a total guess.

auth_sentence.content: If the results are contradictory to your belief system then it doesn't mean that your belief system is invalidated.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the results are contradictory to your belief system then it doesn't mean that your belief system is invalidated.
